frontmatter.title: Cha Tuyên Uý và Trợ Uý

markdownRemark.html:
About

The Chaplain scarf is white with a red stripe border and the TNTT logo on the back. White symbolizes innocence, purity, hope, trust, and victory. Thus, He will be the representative of God to lead the Vietnamese Eucharistic Youth Movement. The Chaplain scarf for brothers and sisters of the Holy Orders is a red scarf symbolizing the blood poured for our sins and sacrifice through service, with a white border representing the hope, patience, and generosity of all Assistant Chaplains of the Movement.
